title: Why does tryns ult have a 60s cd?
body:
When he has a 3s dash, 100% crit rate, a heal, a slow+AD shred, an an ult that makes him not die for 5s.
He can spin in, slow, two hit the ADC, who if is playing MF is dead due to no escapes, turn, two hit the APC, ult and 4 hit the support then dash over a wall and go back to split-pushing.

He has no counter play.

I suggest when he ults, he loses 50% of his AD, there we go, now he's balanced.

Lack of CC? He has a AoE slow + an armour shred.
That's CC.
hes pretty much the same as master yi, a slow isnt much cc thats why he has high damage output. If he was to have a stun maybe he would be broken but a slow is nothing. Hes ballanced

Play a siege comp or teamfight comp and you should rekt Tryndameres. Other than that play teemo, Quinn or Jax into tryndamere and u win easily. Also tryndameres build full damage and therefore it is completely balance for him to 2-3 hit enemies if he is fed. Tryndamere have terrible siege and terrible at defending against a siege comp.
This is y u have something called a flash, dash, cc {{summoner:4}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:429}}
holy sh.it you guys keeping taking the damn baits
While I normally disagree with half the things you complain about, I agree with this. AND I think you're little quick fix with some tweaking, could actually work in balancing him.
